clinical_study.brief_title: First-in-Human Single and Multiple Dose of GLPG1205
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Dose-ranging Study for the Assessment of Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Single and Multiple Ascending Oral Doses of GLPG1205 in Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this First-in-Human study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability after single ascending oral doses of GLPG1205 given to healthy male subjects, compared to placebo. Also, the safety and tolerability of multiple ascending oral doses of GLPG1205 given to healthy male subjects daily for 14 days compared to placebo, will be evaluated.
Furthermore, during the course of the study after single and multiple oral dose administrations, the amount of GLPG1205 present in the blood and urine (pharmacokinetics) as well as the receptor occupancy by GLPG1205 in blood samples (pharmacodynamics) will be characterized compared to placebo.
Also, the potential of cytochrome P450 (CYP)3A4 induction after repeated dosing with GLPG1205 will be explored.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Safety and tolerability after single dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-10 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG1205 in comparison with placebo after a single oral dose in healthy subjects in terms of adverse events, physical examinations, vital signs, ECG and lab assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Safety and tolerability after multiple doses
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-10 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG1205 in comparison with placebo after multiple oral doses daily for 14 days in healthy subjects in terms of adverse events, physical examinations, vital signs, ECG and lab assessments

secondary_outcome.measure: The amount of GLPG1205 in plasma and urine over time after a single oral dose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between Day 1 predose and 48 hours post dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the amount of GLPG1205 in plasma and urine over time - pharmacokinetics (PK) - after a single oral dose in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: The amount of GLPG1205 in plasma and urine over time after multiple oral doses
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between Day 1 predose and Day 16 (48 hours after the last dose)
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the amount of GLPG1205 in plasma and urine over time - pharmacokinetics (PK) - after multiple oral doses in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twelve hours before dosing on Day 1 and Day 14
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the potential of CYP3A4 induction after repeated dosing with GLPG1205 by means of the ratio of 6-b-hydroxycortisol/cortisol in urine

secondary_outcome.measure: Receptor occupancy by GLPG1205 on blood cells after a single dose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose up to 24 hours post dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacodynamics (PD) of GLPG1205 by means of receptor occupancy by GLPG1205 on blood cells after a single oral dose in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Receptor occupancy by GLPG1205 on blood cells after multiple doses
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 14, predose up to 24 hours post dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacodynamics (PD) of GLPG1205 by means of receptor occupancy by GLPG1205 on blood cells after multiple oral doses in healthy subjects

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male, age 18-50 years
- BMI between 18-30 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study
- Drug or alcohol abuse
- Smoking
